name: Monkey. D. Luffy
text: On Play / When Attacking: You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand. Then, this Character gains Double Attack during this turn.

effect.text: You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand. Then, this Character gains Double Attack during this turn.
